channel.title: templating on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in templating on Bodacious Blog

item.title: mustache templating processor
item.description: Manual https://mustache.github.io/mustache.5.html Examples The simplest template: 1 Hello {{name}} Template with section tag: 1 2 3 {{#x}} Some text {{/x}} Here, when x is a Boolean value then the section tag acts like an if conditional, but when x is an array then it acts like a foreach loop. Template that is un-escaped: 1 {{&body}} Here, if body contains HTML, it won’t be escaped.
